## Penn State resources

- PSU [QuantDev R tutorials](https://quantdev.ssri.psu.edu/tutorials) (mostly statistical methods)
- [WeR User Group](https://www.facebook.com/groups/WeRPennStateRUsersGroup/)
- Get your computer set up for access to [PSU's network services](before-the-bootcamp.html)
- Running RStudio 'in the cloud' Penn State's (browser based) [RStudio Server](rstudio-tlt.html)

## Books

- Chang, W. (2012). *R Graphics Cookbook: Practical Recipes for Visualizing Data*. O’Reilly Media, Inc. http://shop.oreilly.com/product/0636920023135.do. [Web version](http://www.cookbook-r.com/Graphs/).
- Gandrud, C. (2015). *Reproducible Research with R and R Studio, Second Edition*. CRC Press. https://www.crcpress.com/Reproducible-Research-with-R-and-R-Studio-Second-Edition/Gandrud/p/book/9781498715379.
- Wickham, H. & Grolemund, G. (2016). *R for Data Science: Import, Tidy, Transform, Visualize, and Model Data*. O’Reilly Media. http://shop.oreilly.com/product/0636920034407.do.
- Muenchen, R. (2009). *R for SAS and SPSS Users*. http://www.springer.com/us/book/9780387094182.
- Xie, Y., Allaire, J. J., & Grolemund, G. (2018). *R Markdown: The Definitive Guide*. <https://www.crcpress.com/R-Markdown-The-Definitive-Guide/Xie-Allaire-Grolemund/p/book/9781138359338>. [Web version](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/).
